/* rstMgn.getConsultingTypeList Main/Sub 분류별 실적 관리 */
SELECT CONSULTING_TYPE , GET_CODE_NM( 'CONSULTING_TYPE', CONSULTING_TYPE) CONSULTING_TYPE_NM
,CONSULTING_NM
, CNT AS VALUE , SUM(CNT) OVER() ALL_CNT , ROUND( ( CNT / SUM(CNT) OVER() ) * 100 , 2 ) AS COLOR_VALUE FROM(
SELECT CS.CONSULTING_TYPE
, CS.CONSULTING_NM
, COUNT(*) CNT FROM TBL_EXP_CONTRACT C ,TBL_EXP_CONSULTING CS WHERE C.CONSULTING_ID = CS.CONSULTING_ID
AND CS.CONSULTING_TYPE = #{SUB_CATEGORY}
GROUP BY CS.CONSULTING_TYPE
, CS.CONSULTING_NM
) ORDER BY COLOR_VALUE DESC
